column4: Procurement safeguards society and the environment
To reach a sustainable future, every company must seek to reduce - and eventually eliminate - any negative environmental and social impact caused by the goods and services it depends upon.

Procurement purchases are likely to include both material inputs and outsourced services. A company should have policies and processes in place that enable it to anticipate where negative supply chain impacts are likely to occur, so that they can be avoided or addressed.
